name: antigravity-autopilot
description: The ultimate AI coding assistant. Merges Auto-Accept, Auto-All, and Yoke Autonomous Mode into one powerful, configurable extension.

commands.title: Antigravity: Toggle MASTER Control (All Core Autonomy)
Antigravity: Refresh Runtime + Reopen Status Menu
Antigravity: Copy Last Resume Payload Report

antigravity.jules.url.description: URL of the Jules Orchestration server.

antigravity.jules.apiKey.description: API Key for Jules Orchestration server.

antigravity.strategy.description: Driver Strategy: 'simple' uses VS Code commands (no restart), 'cdp' uses Browser Protocol (robust, multi-tab, requires restart).
antigravity.strategy.markdownDescription:
**Driver Strategy**: 
- `simple`: Uses standard VS Code commands. Good for basic usage but limited.
- `cdp`: Uses Chrome DevTools Protocol. **Required for Multi-Tab Orchestration, background automation, and robust selector handling.**

antigravity.interactionUiProfile.description: Select UI targeting profile for element selectors and click method bundle.
antigravity.interactionUiProfile.markdownDescription:
**UI Targeting Profile**:
Defines which set of CSS selectors to use for locating Chat Inputs, Send Buttons, and Run/Accept actions.
- `auto`: Automatically detects the environment.
- `vscode`: standard VS Code Chat.
- `antigravity`: Antigravity Webview.
- `cursor`: Cursor AI Pane.

antigravity.autoAcceptEnabled.description: Deprecated: Enable basic Auto-Accept of pending edits.

antigravity.autoAllEnabled.description: Deprecated: Enable robust Auto-All (CDP/Multi-Tab) for edits and terminal commands.

antigravity.autopilotAutoAcceptEnabled.description: Deprecated: Unified control: enable automatic accept/action handling for autopilot.

antigravity.autopilotAutoBumpEnabled.description: Deprecated: Unified control: enable automatic bump/resume nudges when conversation is idle.

antigravity.autopilotRunExpandContinueEn.description: Deprecated: Unified control: allow autopilot to click Run/Expand/Continue style actions.

antigravity.multiTabEnabled.markdownDescription: **Multi-Tab Orchestration**: If enabled, Antigravity will connect to and control **ALL** compatible tabs (pages, iframes, webviews) found on the CDP port, not just the first one. Essential for complex multi-root workspaces.

antigravity.continuousMode.description: Enable continuous task execution in Autonomous Mode (proceed to next task automatically).

antigravity.soundEffectsActionMap.description: DEPRECATED: Configure via code or future audio themes.

antigravity.audio.enabled.markdownDescription: **Audio Feedback**: Enable sound effects for automated actions (Run, Expand, Accept, etc).

antigravity.audio.volume.description: Master volume for sound effects (0.0 to 1.0).

antigravity.audio.actions.run.description: Play sound for 'Run in Terminal' actions.

antigravity.watchdogEnabled.markdownDescription: **Self-Healing Watchdog**: Monitors the browser automation script. If the script stops sending heartbeats (e.g., due to a crash or page reload), the watchdog will automatically re-inject it.

antigravity.watchdogTimeoutMs.markdownDescription: Time in milliseconds to wait for a heartbeat before considering the script 'dead' and triggering re-injection.

antigravity.autoContinueScriptEnabled.description: Master Switch: Enable the injected automation script.
antigravity.autoContinueScriptEnabled.markdownDescription: **Master Switch**: Specific to the Browser/CDP automation. If disabled, **NO** automation scripts will be injected into the browser. This overrides all other `automation.*` settings.

antigravity.automation.actions.clickRun.markdownDescription:
**Auto-Run**:
Automatically clicks 'Run in Terminal' icons (play buttons) in code blocks. 

*Useful for quickly executing suggested commands.*

antigravity.automation.actions.clickExpa.markdownDescription:
**Auto-Expand**:
Automatically clicks 'Expand' twisties and file references to show hidden context or code blocks.

antigravity.automation.actions.clickAcce.markdownDescription:
**Auto-Accept**:
Automatically clicks 'Accept', 'Apply', or 'Insert' buttons for inline code suggestions.

antigravity.automation.actions.clickCont.markdownDescription:
**Auto-Continue**:
Automatically clicks 'Continue' (generation) and 'Keep' (pre-computation) buttons to keep the agent moving.

antigravity.automation.actions.clickSubm.markdownDescription:
**Auto-Submit**:
Automatically clicks 'Send' or 'Submit' buttons if text has been entered into the chat input.

*Ensures your prompts are actually sent.*

antigravity.automation.controls.run.dete.description: Detection components for Run control firing.

antigravity.automation.controls.run.dela.description: Run control delay threshold in milliseconds.

antigravity.automation.controls.expand.d.description: Detection components for Expand control firing.
Expand control delay threshold in milliseconds.

antigravity.automation.controls.accept.d.description: Detection components for Accept control firing.
Accept control delay threshold in milliseconds.

antigravity.automation.controls.submit.d.description: Detection components for Submit control firing.
Submit control delay threshold in milliseconds.

antigravity.automation.controls.acceptAl.description: Detection components for Accept All control firing.
Action methods for Accept All/Keep equivalent control.
Accept All control delay threshold in milliseconds.

antigravity.automation.controls.continue.description: Detection components for Continue/Keep control firing.
Continue control delay threshold in milliseconds.

antigravity.automation.controls.feedback.description: Detection components for Feedback control firing.
Feedback control delay threshold in milliseconds.

antigravity.automation.bump.requireVisib.description: Require the chat document to be visible (not a background tab) before bumping a thread.
antigravity.automation.bump.requireVisib.markdownDescription: **Require Visibility**: If true, the extension will only bump active/visible tabs, preventing it from ghost-typing in background tabs. If false, it will bump all available threads simultaneously. (Default: true)

antigravity.automation.actions.clickFeed.markdownDescription: **Auto-Feedback**: Automatically clicks positive feedback buttons (Thumbs Up) to reinforce successful steps. (Default: true)

antigravity.automation.timing.pollInterv.description: How often (in milliseconds) the automation script scans the DOM for interactable elements. Lower values are more responsive but use more CPU.

antigravity.automation.timing.actionThro.description: Minimum time (in milliseconds) between consecutive automated clicks to prevents rapid-fire misclicks.

antigravity.automation.timing.cooldownMs.description: Global cooldown (in milliseconds) applied after certain heavy actions to allow the UI to settle.

antigravity.automation.timing.randomness.description: Random jitter (in milliseconds) added to actions to simulate human-like variability. Set to 0 for machine precision.

antigravity.automation.debug.highlightCl.description: Visually flash a red border on elements when they are automatically clicked. Useful for verifying what the script is doing.

antigravity.automation.debug.verboseLogg.description: Enable detailed console logs in the browser DevTools for the automation script.

antigravity.automation.debug.logAllActio.description: Emit detailed action/detection logs for each noteworthy automation event.

antigravity.automation.debug.logToExtens.description: Forward automation logs/events from injected scripts into Antigravity Debug output channel.

antigravity.automation.debug.traceSelect.description: Log every selector attempt and match result. Warning: Very noisy.

antigravity.automation.actions.autoScrol.description: Automatically scroll the chat view to the bottom to keep the latest content visible.

antigravity.automation.actions.clickAcce.description: Automatically click 'Accept All' buttons if present (e.g. for batch edits).

antigravity.automation.actions.autoReply.description: Automatically type and send a reply (e.g. 'continue') if the chat is idle. Useful for keeping the agent working.

antigravity.automation.bump.detectMethod.description: Detection components used to decide when bump should fire. Multiple methods can be enabled.

antigravity.automation.bump.typeMethods.description: Typing components used to enter bump text. Multiple methods can be enabled.

antigravity.automation.bump.submitMethod.description: Submit components used after bump text is entered. Multiple methods can be enabled.

antigravity.automation.bump.userDelayMs.description: Delay before bump when the last sender appears to be the user.

antigravity.automation.bump.retryDelayMs.description: Delay before bump when retry-like error text is detected.

antigravity.automation.timing.autoReplyD.description: Time (in milliseconds) to wait before triggering an auto-reply if no other actions occur.

antigravity.autoSwitchModels.description: Automatically switch models based on task type (in Autonomous Mode).

actionThrottleMs.description: Delay (ms) between click actions to prevent flooding.

cooldownMs.description: Cooldown (ms) after a successful auto-bump before retrying.

pollIntervalMs.description: Interval (ms) for the automation loop (overrides pollFrequency).

antigravity.automation.timing.description: Granular timing controls for automation actions.

antigravity.maxLoopsPerSession.description: Max loops before pausing autonomous mode.

antigravity.maxConsecutiveTestLoops.description: Exit after this many consecutive test-only loops

antigravity.executionTimeout.description: Minutes to wait for AI response before timing out.

antigravity.threadWaitInterval.description: Seconds to wait between autonomous loop steps.

antigravity.autoApproveDelay.description: Seconds to wait before auto-approving changes.

antigravity.autoAcceptPollIntervalMs.description: Unified timing: polling interval in ms for auto-accept/action scanning.

antigravity.autoBumpCooldownSec.description: Unified timing: minimum seconds between auto-bump attempts.

antigravity.cdpTimeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for CDP operations.

antigravity.cdpPort.description: Port to use for Chrome DevTools Protocol (CDP).

antigravity.actions.bump.text.description: Text to type when bumping the thread.

antigravity.actions.bump.typingDelayMs.description: Delay (ms) between keystrokes when typing bump message.

antigravity.actions.bump.submitDelayMs.description: Delay (ms) before submitting the bump message.

antigravity.actions.autoAccept.pollInter.description: How often to scan for accept buttons (ms).

antigravity.actions.autoAccept.delayMs.description: Delay (ms) before clicking an accept button after finding it.

antigravity.actions.run.delayMs.description: Delay (ms) before clicking a run button.

antigravity.runtimeWaitingReminderEnable.description: Show reminder notifications when runtime stays in waiting_for_chat_message state.

antigravity.runtimeWaitingReminderDelayS.description: Seconds to wait in waiting_for_chat_message state before showing reminder.

antigravity.runtimeWaitingReminderCooldo.description: Minimum seconds between repeated waiting-state reminders.

antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeEnabled.description: Automatically send a resume message when runtime remains in waiting_for_chat_message state.

antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeMessage.default: Continue with the next highest-priority development task in this workspace. If everything is complete, summarize what is done and propose the next best improvement.
antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeMessage.description: Message sent automatically (or manually) to resume Copilot chat when waiting.

antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeUseMinimalC.description: When waiting-for-chat completion is confidently detected, send a concise continuation nudge for Copilot Insiders instead of the full resume prompt.

antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeMinimalMess.default: Continue with the next highest-priority development task in this workspace.
antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeMinimalMess.description: Short continuation message used when minimal continue mode is enabled and runtime is waiting for a new chat message.

antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeMinimalMess.default: Continue with the next highest-priority coding task in this VS Code workspace.
antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeMinimalMess.description: Profile-specific minimal continuation message used when runtime mode resolves to vscode.

antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeMinimalMess.default: Continue with the next highest-priority Antigravity development task.
antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeMinimalMess.description: Profile-specific minimal continuation message used when runtime mode resolves to antigravity.

antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeMinimalMess.default: Continue with the next highest-priority Cursor coding task in this workspace.
antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeMinimalMess.description: Profile-specific minimal continuation message used when runtime mode resolves to cursor.

antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeCooldownSec.description: Minimum seconds between automatic resume messages while waiting.

antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeStabilityPo.description: How many consecutive runtime polls must report ready-to-resume before automatic resume sends a message.

antigravity.runtimeAutoFixWaitingEnabled.description: Enable watchdog that runs safe readiness auto-fix actions when waiting state persists.

antigravity.runtimeAutoFixWaitingDelaySe.description: Seconds to remain in waiting state before watchdog triggers Auto-Fix Resume Readiness.

antigravity.runtimeAutoFixWaitingCooldow.description: Minimum seconds between watchdog auto-fix runs while waiting persists.

antigravity.runtimeAutoFixWaitingEscalat.description: When watchdog auto-fix repeatedly fails to recover waiting state, force one full resume prompt on the next automatic resume attempt.
Number of consecutive watchdog non-recovery outcomes before escalation arms a one-time full resume prompt.
Minimum seconds between escalation re-arms to prevent repeated full-prompt bursts during prolonged noisy waiting states.
Maximum number of recent watchdog escalation events retained in runtime telemetry and diagnostics reports.

antigravity.runtimeEscalationClearRequir.description: Require a confirmation dialog before clearing escalation timeline data from commands or dashboard actions.

antigravity.runtimeTelemetryStaleSec.description: Seconds after which runtime telemetry is marked stale in the dashboard if no fresh updates are observed.

antigravity.runtimeStatusMenuRefreshDebo.description: Debounce window in milliseconds for the 'Refresh Runtime + Reopen Status Menu' action to prevent rapid overlap/flooding.

antigravity.runtimeStatusMenuRefreshDebu.description: When enabled, logs detailed skip/run reasons for status-menu refresh guard behavior (in-flight/debounce).

antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeMinScore.description: Minimum Cross-UI self-test score required before automatic resume sends a message.

antigravity.runtimeAutoResumeRequireStri.description: Require strict VS Code + Antigravity text/button readiness before automatic resume is allowed.

antigravity.acceptPatterns.description: Custom button text patterns to Click (overrides defaults).

antigravity.rejectPatterns.description: Custom button text patterns to Avoid (appended to defaults).

antigravity.interactionTextMethods.description: Enabled text input methods (IDs). Options: cdp-keys, cdp-insert-text, clipboard-paste, dom-inject, bridge-type, vscode-type

antigravity.accessibility.screenReaderOp.description: Optimize UI and Status Bar for Screen Readers (concise text, explicit ARIA labels).

antigravity.interactionClickMethods.description: Enabled click methods (IDs). Options: dom-scan-click, dom-click, bridge-click, cdp-mouse, native-accept, vscode-cmd, script-force, process-peek, visual-verify-click, coord-click

antigravity.interactionSubmitMethods.description: Enabled submit methods (IDs). Options: vscode-submit, cdp-enter, script-submit, ctrl-enter, alt-enter

antigravity.interactionTimings.description: Per-method timing overrides in ms. Example: {"cdp-keys": 20, "cdp-enter": 100}

antigravity.interactionRetryCount.description: How many methods to try (sequentially) before giving up.

antigravity.interactionParallel.description: Try all enabled methods simultaneously instead of sequentially.

antigravity.interactionVisualDiffThresho.description: Visual diff sensitivity for screenshot-verified click methods (0-1).

antigravity.interactionClickMethodsVSCod.description: Click method IDs used when UI profile resolves to vscode.

antigravity.interactionClickMethodsAntig.description: Click method IDs used when UI profile resolves to antigravity.

antigravity.interactionClickMethodsCurso.description: Click method IDs used when UI profile resolves to cursor.

antigravity.experimental.cdpExplicitDisc.description: If true, explicitly queries for existing webviews/iframes and attaches to them on startup. Disable if experiencing blank screen issues.

antigravity.experimental.cdpAggressiveDi.description: Enable aggressive CDP target discovery/attachment for nested webviews/iframes. WARNING: May cause UI instability or blank panels.

scripts.verify:release:secure: npm run audit:policy && npm run verify:release
scripts.verify:release: npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run package && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const crypto=require('crypto');const pkg=require('./package.json');const f='antigravity-autopilot-'+pkg.version+'.vsix';const b=fs.readFileSync(f);console.log('VSIX',f);console.log('SHA256',crypto.createHash('sha256').update(b).digest('hex').toUpperCase());console.log('SIZE',b.length);"
